name: Arboria (itch) (Coloradete)
description:
Arboria is a platformer game where a drop of sap navigates through the maze of a tree. You must traverse the maze in search of nutrients and sediments that will earn points in your race towards the roots. Descend into the labyrinth and compete with up to four other players simultaneously. Winner of the Granada Jam 2023.

You can only play this game with controller, connect them and press any button to start!
